description.@en: You have spent and spent and spent, borrowing far too much money without the possibility of return to your creditors. You may have even been committed to a debtor’s prison. This carries a social stigma, leaving a black stain upon your shield of reputation and conscience. As such, you find it exceedingly difficult – if not impossible – to come to any sort of middle ground with others given your history.

effect.@en: You must flip the results to fail all Skill Tests that rely on your ability to barter, bargain or strike monetary deals in your favor.
